title: PhysiQ
description: Off-site quality assessment framework for physical therapy exercises using smartwatch and multi-task spatiotemporal Siamese Neural Network

title: Database Management System
description: Implemented paged file (PF) and record-based file (RBF) management systems in C/C++. Upgraded relation manager (RM) designs to store catalog information by columns with hidden metadata

title: B+ Tree for Database Management
description: Developed a B+ tree data structure for efficient database management with optimized insertion, deletion, and search operations, significantly improving database performance

title: Process and Resource Manager
description: Implemented Python data structures to manage processes and resources, optimizing process states and supporting multi-unit resource usage

title: File System
description: Designed a Java file system using an emulated disk, optimized with a directory using fixed index structures as file descriptors

title: Simple Bash-like Shell
description: Created a C-based shell capable of handling simple and complex commands, with multi-piping, redirection, background process, and signal handling functionalities

title: Search Engine
description: Implemented a search engine in Python that ranks HTML data's importance using term frequency-inverse document frequency (tf-idf) and cosine similarity for search functionality

title: Single Sign On
description: Developed SSO authentication system during Information Services internship

title: Online Movies Store Web Application
description: Collaborated on building a cloud-based server and web application using Java, MySQL, HTML, CSS, and Maven. Optimized usability with Tomcat and MySQL replication, connection pooling, and micro-services architecture

title: AI Stock Watch Bot
description: Built an AI bot for monitoring stock market trends and making data-driven predictions using machine learning techniques to analyze historical stock data. Implemented machine learning algorithms, data preprocessing, and financial data APIs

title: Stay Together (Opioid Hackathon - Final Nominee)
description: Worked as iOS developer on a Swift-based social media application designed to treat opioid-addicted patients through a supportive community with strong interaction among patients, family members, and specialists
